mapper.update:
UPDATE condition_pool
menu_code = #{menuCode},
menu_name = #{menuName},
page_name = #{pageName},
condition_name = #{conditionName},
condition_value = #{conditionValue},
condition_type = #{conditionType},
rule = #{rule},
platform_id = #{platformId},
tbody_value = #{tbodyValue},
is_dft = #{isDft},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
